00037 //! Measure Relaxation Curve
00038 class XNMRT1 : public XSecondaryDriver
00039 {
00040     XNODE_OBJECT
00041 protected:
00042     XNMRT1(const char *name, bool runtime,
00043            const shared_ptr<XScalarEntryList> &scalarentries,
00044            const shared_ptr<XInterfaceList> &interfaces,
00045            const shared_ptr<XThermometerList> &thermometers,
00046            const shared_ptr<XDriverList> &drivers);
00047 public:
00048     ~XNMRT1 () {}
00049   
00050     //! show all forms belonging to driver
00051     virtual void showForms();
00052 protected:
00053 
00054     //! this is called when connected driver emit a signal
00055     //! unless dependency is broken
00056     //! all connected drivers are readLocked
00057     virtual void analyze(const shared_ptr<XDriver> &emitter) throw (XRecordError&);
00058     //! this is called after analyze() or analyzeRaw()
00059     //! record is readLocked
00060     virtual void visualize();
00061     //! check connected drivers have valid time
00062     //! \return true if dependency is resolved
00063     virtual bool checkDependency(const shared_ptr<XDriver> &emitter) const;
00064  
00065 public:
00066     //! Holds 1/T1 or 1/T2 and its std. deviation
00067     const shared_ptr<XScalarEntry> &t1inv() const {return m_t1inv;}
00068     const shared_ptr<XScalarEntry> &t1invErr() const {return m_t1invErr;}
00069 
00070     const shared_ptr<XItemNode < XDriverList, XPulser > > &pulser() const {return m_pulser;}
00071     const shared_ptr<XItemNode < XDriverList, XNMRPulseAnalyzer > > &pulse1() const {return m_pulse1;}
00072     const shared_ptr<XItemNode < XDriverList, XNMRPulseAnalyzer > > &pulse2() const {return m_pulse2;}
00073 
00074     //! If active, a control to Pulser is allowed
00075     const shared_ptr<XBoolNode> &active() const {return m_active;}
00076     //! Deduce phase from data
00077     const shared_ptr<XBoolNode> &autoPhase() const {return m_autoPhase;}
00078     //! Fit 3 parameters.
00079     const shared_ptr<XBoolNode> &mInftyFit() const {return m_mInftyFit;}
00080     //! Use absolute value, ignoring phase
00081     const shared_ptr<XBoolNode> &absFit() const {return m_absFit;}
00082     //! Region of P1 or 2tau for fitting, display, control of pulser [ms]
00083     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> &p1Min() const {return m_p1Min;}
00084     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> &p1Max() const {return m_p1Max;}
00085     //! (Deduced) phase of echoes [deg.]
00086     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> &phase() const {return m_phase;}
00087     //! Center freq of echoes [kHz].
00088     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> &freq() const {return m_freq;}
00089     /// FFT Window Function
00090     const shared_ptr<XComboNode> &windowFunc() const {return m_windowFunc;}
00091     /// FFT Window Length
00092     const shared_ptr<XComboNode> &windowWidth() const {return m_windowWidth;}
00093     //! Auto-select window.
00094     const shared_ptr<XBoolNode> &autoWindow() const {return m_autoWindow;}
00095     enum MEASMODE {MEAS_T1 = 0, MEAS_T2 = 1, MEAS_ST_E = 2};
00096     //! T1/T2/StE measurement
00097     const shared_ptr<XComboNode> &mode() const {return m_mode;}
00098     //! # of Samples for fitting and display
00099     const shared_ptr<XUIntNode> &smoothSamples() const {return m_smoothSamples;}
00100     //! Distribution of P1 or 2tau
00101     const shared_ptr<XComboNode> &p1Dist() const {return m_p1Dist;}
00102     //! Relaxation Function
00103     const shared_ptr<XItemNode < XRelaxFuncList, XRelaxFunc > >  &relaxFunc() const {return m_relaxFunc;}

00139     //! For fitting and display
00140     struct Pt
00141     {
00142         double var; /// auto-phase- or absolute value
00143         std::complex<double> c;
00144         double p1;
00145         double isigma; /// weight
00146         std::deque<std::complex<double> > value_by_cond;
00147     };

00150     struct NLLS
00151     {
00152         std::deque< Pt > *pts; //pointer to data
00153         shared_ptr<XRelaxFunc> func; //pointer to the current relaxation function
00154         bool is_minftyfit; //3param fit or not.
00155         double fixed_minfty;
00156     };
